title: shaanthamu lEka
sahitya:
shAntamu lEka saukhyamu lEdu sArasadaLa nayana

anupallavi

 dAntunikaina vEdAntunikaina

caraNam 1

 dAra sutulu dhana dhAnyamu luNDina sAreju japa tapa sampada galgina
   
caraNam 2

 Agaama shAtramulanniyu jaDivina bAguga sakala hrd-bhAvamu delisina
   
caraNam 3

 yAgAdi karmamulanniyu jEsina bhAgavatulanucu bAguga bEraina
   
caraNam 4

 rAjAdhi rAja shrI rAghava tyAgarAja vinuta sAdhu rakSaka tanakupa
